org.encog.neural.persist
Interface EncogPersistedObject

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ActivationFunction
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivationLinear, ActivationSigmoid, ActivationTANH, BasicLayer, BasicNetwork, BasicNeuralDataSet, FeedforwardLayer, HopfieldLayer, ImageNeuralDataSet, MarketNeuralDataSet, Matrix, SOMLayer, TemporalNeuralDataSet, XMLNeuralDataSet
public interface EncogPersistedObject
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface flags an class as being able to be persisted into an Encog collection.

Author:
jheaton
